Class CollisionHandler

java.lang.Object
io.mygame.common.CollisionHandler
public class CollisionHandler extends Object
Handles collision detection for an entity against objects in a TiledMap. Provides methods for checking collisions, drawing debug information, and managing entity positions.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CollisionHandler(Entity entity, List<NPC> npcs, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
    Constructs a CollisionHandler for managing collisions involving a specific entity and NPCs on a TiledMap, with debug information rendered using the specified camera.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollisionHandler

      public CollisionHandler(Entity entity, List<NPC> npcs, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
      Constructs a CollisionHandler for managing collisions involving a specific entity and NPCs on a TiledMap, with debug information rendered using the specified camera.
      Parameters:
      entity - the main game entity whose collisions will be handled
      npcs - the list of non-playable characters (NPCs) for interaction and collision
      map - the TiledMap containing the collision objects
      camera - the OrthographicCamera used for rendering debug information

  • Method Details

    • handlePlayerCollision

      public void handlePlayerCollision()
      Handles collision detection and resolution for the entity. This method checks if the entity collides with objects in the TiledMap and attempts to resolve the collision by adjusting the entity's position. It also updates the interaction circle's position and renders debug information if debug mode is enabled.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the collision detection process, such as a missing collision layer or an incompatible object type

    • checkObjectInteractions

      public String checkObjectInteractions()
      Checks for object interactions in the interaction layer of the TiledMap. Returns the name of the layer where an interaction is detected.
      Returns:
      the name of the interaction layer, or null if no interaction occurs
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the interaction layer is not found

    • checkNPCInteractions

      public String checkNPCInteractions()
      Checks for NPC interactions within the interaction circle. Returns the type of the NPC being interacted with.
      Returns:
      the type of the NPC, or null if no interaction occurs

    • handleNpcCollision

      public void handleNpcCollision()
      Handles collisions between NPCs and other objects or tiles in the map. Updates NPC positions to avoid overlapping.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a critical error occurs during NPC collision handling

    • savePreviousPosition

      public void savePreviousPosition()
      Saves the current position of the player entity for collision rollback.

    • revertToPreviousPosition

      public void revertToPreviousPosition()
      Reverts the player entity's position to the last saved position.

    • savePreviousPositionNpc

      public void savePreviousPositionNpc(NPC npc)
      Saves the current position of an NPC for collision rollback.
      Parameters:
      npc - the NPC whose position will be saved

    • revertToPreviousPositionNpc

      public void revertToPreviousPositionNpc(NPC npc)
      Reverts the position of an NPC to the last saved position.
      Parameters:
      npc - the NPC whose position will be reverted

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Releases resources used by the CollisionHandler.
